trans-unit.source: Represents the main scrollable region inside a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> 控件内的主要可滚动区域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo> interface exposes access to methods that enable logical scrolling of child content as well as computing which child elements are visible.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo>接口公开访问启用的子内容的逻辑滚动，以及计算哪些子元素可见的方法。

trans-unit.source: In addition, it defines properties used to define the scrollable region.
trans-unit.target: 此外，它定义用于定义可滚动区域的属性。

trans-unit.source: Logical scrolling enables scrolling to the next element in the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 逻辑滚动支持滚动到的逻辑树中的下一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Physical scrolling, in contrast, scrolls content by a defined measurable increment in a specified direction.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，物理滚动，按照指定方向中定义的显著提高增量滚动内容。

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set the value of its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装主机<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>中的元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>和的值设置其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether scrolling on the horizontal axis is possible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以在水平轴上滚动。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if scrolling is possible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以滚动，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.CanHorizontallyScroll%2A> property by using procedural code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.CanHorizontallyScroll%2A>通过过程代码的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether scrolling on the vertical axis is possible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以在垂直轴上滚动。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if scrolling is possible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以滚动，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.CanVerticallyScroll%2A> property by using procedural code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.CanVerticallyScroll%2A>通过过程代码的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: 获取范围的垂直大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents, in device independent pixels, the vertical size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Double" />，它表示盘区的垂直大小（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: 获取此盘区的水平大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents, in device independent pixels, the horizontal size of the extent.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Double" />，它表示盘区的水平大小（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: 获取滚动内容的水平偏移量。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents, in device independent pixels, the horizontal offset.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> ，表示以与设备无关的像素的水平偏移量。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are between zero and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.ExtentWidth%2A> minus the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.ViewportWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有效值介于 0 与 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.ExtentWidth%2A> 减去 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.ViewportWidth%2A> 所得的数值之间。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls down within content by one logical unit.
trans-unit.target: 在内容中向下滚动一个逻辑单元。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls left within content by one logical unit.
trans-unit.target: 在内容中向左滚动一个逻辑单元。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.LineLeft%2A> method in procedural code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.LineLeft%2A>在程序代码中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls right within content by one logical unit.
trans-unit.target: 在内容中向右滚动一个逻辑单元。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.LineRight%2A> method in procedural code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.LineRight%2A>在程序代码中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls up within content by one logical unit.
trans-unit.target: 在内容中向上滚动一个逻辑单元。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> that becomes visible.
trans-unit.target: 变为可见的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />。

trans-unit.source: A bounding rectangle that identifies the coordinate space to make visible.
trans-unit.target: 标识要使其可见的坐标空间的边界矩形。

trans-unit.source: Forces content to scroll until the coordinate space of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> object is visible.
trans-unit.target: 强制内容滚动，直至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 对象的坐标空间可见。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that is visible.
trans-unit.target: 可见的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" />。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the returned rectangle is a transformed version of the input rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，返回的矩形是矩形的输入的转换后的版本。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, such as when the input rectangle cannot fit entirely within the viewport, the return value may be smaller.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，例如当输入的矩形不能完全适合视区内，返回的值可能较小。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls down within content after a user clicks the wheel button on a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 用户单击鼠标的滚轮按钮后向下滚动内容。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.MouseWheelDown%2A> method in procedural code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.MouseWheelDown%2A>在程序代码中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls left within content after a user clicks the wheel button on a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 用户单击鼠标的滚轮按钮后向左滚动内容。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.MouseWheelLeft%2A> method in procedural code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.MouseWheelLeft%2A>在程序代码中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls right within content after a user clicks the wheel button on a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 用户单击了鼠标的滚轮按钮之后向右滚动内容。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.MouseWheelRight%2A> method in procedural code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.MouseWheelRight%2A>在程序代码中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls up within content after a user clicks the wheel button on a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 用户单击鼠标的滚轮按钮后向上滚动内容。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.MouseWheelUp%2A> method in procedural code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.MouseWheelUp%2A>在程序代码中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls down within content by one page.
trans-unit.target: 在内容中向下滚动一页。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.PageDown%2A> method in procedural code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.PageDown%2A>在程序代码中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls left within content by one page.
trans-unit.target: 在内容中向左滚动一页。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.PageLeft%2A> method in procedural code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.PageLeft%2A>在程序代码中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls right within content by one page.
trans-unit.target: 向右滚动一页的内容。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.PageRight%2A> method in procedural code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.PageRight%2A>在程序代码中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls up within content by one page.
trans-unit.target: 在内容中向上滚动一页。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.MouseWheelLeft%2A> method in procedural code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.MouseWheelLeft%2A>在程序代码中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> element that controls scrolling behavior.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个控制滚动行为的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> 元素。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> element that controls scrolling behavior.
trans-unit.target: 控制滚动行为的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> 元素。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: Classes that implement <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo> must call <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.InvalidateScrollInfo%2A> on this object when properties change.
trans-unit.target: 类实现<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo>必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.InvalidateScrollInfo%2A>属性更改时此对象上。

trans-unit.source: Logical scrolling enables scrolling to the next element in the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 逻辑滚动支持滚动到的逻辑树中的下一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Physical scrolling, in contrast, scrolls content by a defined measurable increment in a specified direction.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，物理滚动，按照指定方向中定义的显著提高增量滚动内容。

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set the value of its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装主机<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>中的元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>和的值设置其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.ScrollOwner%2A> property by using procedural code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.ScrollOwner%2A>通过过程代码的属性。

trans-unit.source: The degree to which content is horizontally offset from the containing viewport.
trans-unit.target: 内容从包含的视图水平偏移的程度。

trans-unit.source: Sets the amount of horizontal offset.
trans-unit.target: 设置水平偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The degree to which content is vertically offset from the containing viewport.
trans-unit.target: 内容从所含视图垂直偏移的程度。

trans-unit.source: Sets the amount of vertical offset.
trans-unit.target: 设置垂直偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: 获取滚动内容的垂直偏移量。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents, in device independent pixels, the vertical offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> ，表示以与设备无关的像素，滚动内容的垂直偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are between zero and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.ExtentHeight" /> minus the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.ViewportHeight" />.
trans-unit.target: 有效值介于 0 与 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.ExtentHeight" /> 减去 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo.ViewportHeight" /> 所得的数值之间。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical size of the viewport for this content.
trans-unit.target: 获取此内容的视区的垂直大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents, in device independent pixels, the vertical size of the viewport for this content.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> ，表示以与设备无关的像素，此内容的视区的垂直大小。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal size of the viewport for this content.
trans-unit.target: 获取此内容的视区的水平大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents, in device independent pixels, the horizontal size of the viewport for this content.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> ，表示以与设备无关的像素，此内容的视区的水平大小。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。
